title: First Brands Founder Says Jefferies Is Withholding Documents
description: First Brands Group founder Patrick James said Jefferies Financial Group was refusing to turn over documents that would “put the lie” to the financial firm’s claims that he defrauded it.
content: First Brands Group founder Patrick James said Jefferies Financial Group was refusing to turn over documents that would “put the lie” to the financial firm’s claims that he defrauded it.
